RenoiseScriptingTool.Name: X-Touch
RenoiseScriptingTool.Author: Damien Leroux | damien.leroux+renoise-xtouch@gmail.com
RenoiseScriptingTool.Description: Aiming at full support of the splendid X-Touch. X-Touch has to be in XCtl mode, which implies to connect it with MIDI cables or network. Only MIDI is planned so far.
